#!/usr/bin/env ruby $KCODE = 'U'
$entity_to_char = { } File.open("#{ENV['TM_BUNDLE_SUPPORT']}/entities.txt").read.scan(/^(\d+)\t(.+)$/) do |key, value| $entity_to_char[value] = [key.to_i].pack('U') end
res = STDIN.read.gsub(/&(?:([a-z0-9]+)|#([0-9]+)|#x([0-9A-F]+));/i) do |m| if $1 then $entity_to_char[$1] || m else [$2 ? $2.to_i : $3.hex].pack("U") end end
print res
